name: aws-serverless
description: Some thing so I can prove out the components of serverless lambda creation

scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file serverless.yaml --s3-bucket lambda-build-store --s3-prefix "aws-serverless" --output-template-file serverless-output.yaml
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file serverless-output.yaml --stack-name "aws-serverless" --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM || describe-stack-events --stack-name aws-serverless
